Comment: Schumer used to be, and maybe still is, a good communicator.  His problem is that the methods of communication have changed, but his methods have not.  Whitmer's brand is 'working with the other side'.  It is who she is and she should own it. She's a solid centrist, anyways.  But, she represents Michigan -- the home of Nugent and Kid Rock and 100 militias and 1,000s of blue collar auto workers.  Remember during Covid when armed men 'protested' outside of the Statehouse looking like they were about to invade a country, all because they couldn't sit their white trash asses down on a bar stool and drink shitty beer?  Yeah, that is who she represents so cut her some slack.  And yes, I am fully aware that there are plenty of good people in Michigan, too, so just paining the picture.  Even Slotkin is threatened by militias on a regular basis.  The only thing Dems can do, whether in Congress or in another position, is to simply do their own thing and fight it out.  That's the only way a common thread to rally around will emerge.  It's not enough to simply be anti-Trump, anti-MAGA, or whatever.
